description: Array T(n,k) of k-th order Fibonacci numbers read by antidiagonals in up-direction.
references: N. Wirth, Algorithmen und Datenstrukturen, 1975, table 2.15 (ch. 2.3.4)
links: T. D. Noe, Rows n=1..50 of triangle, flattened
mathematica: max = 12; Clear[f]; f[k_, n_] /; n > k := f[k, n] = Sum[f[k, n - j], {j, 1, k + 1}]; f[k_, n_] = 1; t = Table[ Table[ f[k, n], {n, k + 1, max}], {k, 1, max}]; Table[ t[[k - n + 1, n]], {k, 1, max - 1}, {n, 1, k}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 10 2013 *)
author: _Frank Ellermann_, Jun 11 2001
